newsitem.title: TUNISIA: Germany in $14.4 mln water project loan to Tunisia.
newsitem.headline: Germany in $14.4 mln water project loan to Tunisia.

text.p: Germany and Tunisia on Friday signed a $14.4 million loan agreement to finance small- and medium-sized irrigation projects, the official TAP news agency said.

"The project, which is in the framework of bilateral financial cooperation, aims to restore and modernise about 130 agriculture areas covering 11,000 hectares surface in the central regions of Kairouan, Sidi Bouzid and Kasserine," TAP said.
